name: Firefox 40+ Inspector - Simple White Update
description: This style corrects some deficiencies in the theme Simple White by Louis Chan versions 2.2b18 and earlier. This is only for the Inspector component of Firefox. It provides for the changes in the most recent versions of Firefox. This is only a small patch while we await an official update ;) This update was just updated to work with the latest Developer Edition.
additional_info: This adds/fixes the close/remove buttons for the filter/search fields. It also adds an animated icon for the expand/collapse pane button, which was empty. It adds background highlight color for the filtered terms in the Rules tab content. It moves the Browser Styles check box in the Computed tab to a usable position. The border will turn red if the filter fails in these tabs. I tried my best to maintain the style within the theme motif. For compatibility with Developer Edition (formerly Aurora) it supplies buttons to Add new rules and to Toggle pseudo-classes in the Rules tab. Furthermore, it provides a button to Minimize the toolbox which is missing in the current default theme. All important issues are solved for light and dark themes. I tested this with Firefox 39, 40, 41b3 and Firefox Developer Edition 42.0a2 running on Windows 8. On Firefox 39, it only adds the close/remove buttons for the filter/search fields, but I made sure it has no negative impact.
